document.heading: Procurement Practices Human Care Agreement Amendment Act of 2000

history.narrative: Law 13-155, the “Procurement Practices Human Care Agreement Amendment Act of 2000,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 13-353, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 4, 2000, and May 3, 2000, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 19, 2000, it was assigned Act No. 13-353 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 13-155 became effective on September 16, 2000.
